# [x]           | Assign(expr* targets, expr value)
#   where `targets` is
#     [x]       | Name(identifier id, expr_context ctx)

x = 3


---[ast.dump]--------------------

Module(body=[Assign(targets=[Name(id='x', ctx=Store())], value=Num(n=3))])


---[astdump]---------------------

Module
  Assign
    Name
      Store
    Num
